channel.title: Stereo to Mic
channel.description: I want to piss people off on cod4(example) and somehow plug in the output into the input so I record what sound comes out. Is there such thing to do?

item.title: Stereo to Mic
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

well erm il just write up a tut and i have no clue if it will work.

items needed:
1 old xbox live headset
1 sterio or radio what ever you want
1 old set of ear phones
celetape
and rubber gloves (pink ones)

step1: put on your pink rubber gloves
step2: take your scissors and cut the tip of your microphone off.
step3: with the scissors cut off the end of the ear phones
step4: put the wires together and celetape them/super glue them
step5: plug it into a external music source (mp3, sterio or radio) stand back and press play.

note: you must be supervised at all times and be using a wireless controler to reduce the shock you might obtain. also im not responsible if you hurt your self or get sufficated in them pink gloves.

Read full topic
